details: Mentored school students in Backend development using Node.js
Taught core backend technologies: JavaScript, TypeScript, Node.js, Express.js, NestJS
Introduced students to REST API development and database fundamentals (MongoDB, PostgreSQL)
Helped students understand complex backend concepts through practical examples
Reviewed homework assignments and provided constructive code feedback
experience.title: Mentor

details: Developed efficient and scalable RESTful APIs using Drizzle ORM and PostgreSQL
Optimized SQL queries, improving database performance and request speed
Prepared API documentation using Swagger, improving collaboration between frontend and backend teams
experience.title: Backend Developer Intern

experience.title: Teacher Assistant

personalInfo.bio: I am a Backend Developer specializing in building robust and scalable RESTful APIs using Node.js and TypeScript, with hands-on experience in SQL (PostgreSQL) and NoSQL (MongoDB) databases, efficient database schema design, clean and maintainable architecture, JWT-based authentication and Role-Based Access Control (RBAC), as well as integrating Telegram Bots and real-world backend systems; I have successfully delivered multiple backend projects, collaborated in team-based environments, mentored junior students, and continuously focus on clean code, efficient architecture, and learning to solve complex backend challenges, and I am currently open to internship or junior backend developer opportunities.
personalInfo.name: Ali Ismoilov
personalInfo.title: Backend Developer (Node.js)

projects.description: An advanced, autonomous management ecosystem for modern education centers. This project leverages Event-Driven Architecture and Real-time Monitoring as its core pillars. It features a custom-built notification engine using WebSockets and NestJS Task Scheduling to automate teacher reminders and attendance tracking. The system includes a proactive audit trail for payments through TypeORM Subscribers, ensuring total financial transparency.
projects.title: Education Center CRM System

projects.description: A high-performance backend system designed for grocery store automation, focusing on inventory management and transaction integrity. The engine handles complex stock tracking, automated sales reporting, and profit-loss analysis. It utilizes Redis caching to optimize data retrieval speeds and is fully Dockerized for seamless deployment on VPS, ensuring consistent environment reliability across production.
projects.title: Market Automation System

projects.description: A robust CRM and booking engine for barbershops and beauty salons. The platform manages complex service scheduling, staff shift rotations, and customer profile tracking. It features a sophisticated Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) system to ensure secure data isolation between administrators, stylists, and clients. Built with NestJS and PostgreSQL, the system focuses on high availability and streamlined business workflows.
projects.title: Barbers Management System
